public class  ArclessRootGraphNode
     extends OKBCUI.GraphNode
{
          // Constructors 1
     public ArclessRootGraphNode();

          // Methods 3
     public GraphNode create_node(GrapherPanel, Kb, Node, Node, OKBCString);
     public void paintArc(Graphics, FontMetrics, BoundingBox, GraphNode, BoundingBox);
     public String toString();
}

An ArclessNullGraphNode is identical to a GraphNode except, if its visual representation is the empty string, its arcs aren't drawn.
